Fix compatibility inside Cydia on iOS 9 (Thanks to JerryEn for the fix) - Fixed support for the Chinese handwriting keyboard

- Fixed long standard bug where swiping caused auto correction to get confused.

- Added workaround to move the cursor in Safari on iOS 8
Added:
- AltKeyboard2 v1.0.8 Compatibility
Fixed:
- iOS 7 double deletion bug
- Improved support for some international keyboards


Added:
- 64 bit support (5S, iPad Air, new iPad mini)
- Support for the iWork applications
Added: Scroll text views as selection changes Fixed: Delete button bug caused by the previous update.

Fixed:
- "123" button slide to quickly select a number.
- Swipe up to quickly access accents.
- Delete button now deletes multiple character letters bit by bit as it should.
- Decreased sensitivity on the iPhone as well.
- Slightly increased it's scrolling speed.
- Improved detection of custom handwriting keyboards such as Grafiti

Thanks to yfrancis for promoting my to work on updating it.
Made it less sensitive on the iPad to avoid accidentally triggering a swipe while typing Added the ability to start selection from the delete button as well as the shift key to make it more useable on the iPhone and with some international keyboards.

Big thanks to @iamharicc for the addition of the delete selection code. Rewritten to work universally across iOS, and even custom text input in apps Added support for:
- the auto correction bar, and
- Chinese handwriting recognition

Added support for:
- web views (Safari).
- Mail.app.
(working on support for Sparrow and rich text editors)

Fixed the bug that prevented access to character accents.
Fixed bug that prevented scrolling on the Emoji keyboard
